current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To authorize the transfer of certain items under the control of the Omar Bradley Foundation to the
			 descendants of General Omar Bradley.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: General of the Army Omar Bradley Property Transfer Act of 2014
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Army Omar Bradley Property Transfer Act of 2014

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

header.#text: Transfer of certain items of the Omar Bradley Foundation to the descendants of General Omar Bradley

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
determines to be
			 without
			 historic value to the Army.

text.#text:
The Omar Bradley Foundation, Pennsylvania, may transfer, without consideration, to the child of
			 General of the Army Omar Nelson Bradley and his first wife Mary Elizabeth
			 Quayle Bradley, namely Elizabeth Bradley, such items of the Omar Bradley
			 estate under the
			 control of the Foundation as the

No item may be transferred under subsection (a) unless the claim for the transfer of such item is
			 submitted to the Omar Bradley Foundation during the 180-day period
			 beginning on the date of the enactment of this Act.

header.#text: Time of submittal of  claim for transfer
